content: Use the <color=#8AAB4B>Building Site Fence</color> dedicated to our new neighbor to reserve the spot you think is most suitable, then build the house for them.

content: The Dream Home is complete. I will contact {新友邻} for the relocation. For the remaining matters, I'm counting on you too, <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, hoho~!

content: Whether you're being modest or underestimating yourself, hohoho, please trust your own judgment.

content: Hoho, when you decide on which new neighbor to invite, feel free to come <color=#8AAB4B>"talk about neighbor matters"</color> with me.

content: And now... my apologies! You'll also see the <color=#8AAB4B>Dream Builder Box</color> in front of the Building Site Fence.

content: I hope you will care for {新友邻}'s "<color=#8AAB4B>dream home</color>" just like how you helped Frostia.

content: What an impressive answer! No wonder all the neighbors trust you so much.
